name: Footholds Design System
description:
Design System from Visible. Last Updated December 2021.


Components use Auto layout, properties and variants. Maintained by the Visible team. Feel free to duplicate.


Contains:

  • Color library
  • Typographic styles
  • Spacing
  • Buttons
  • Badges
  • Alerts
  • Forms
  • Filters
  • Icons (Custom made by the team, from FontAwesome and IBM Carbon)
  • Sidebars
  • Alert messages
  • Toolbars
  • Tables
